entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
